text: The Melody Club is a pop band from the town of Växjö in Sweden. The band was started in 2000, and participated at Melodifestivalen in 2011 with the song "The Hunter". ==Discography== ===Albums=== Year Album Chart position NOR SWE 2002 Music Machine 17 1 2004 Face the Music — 6 2006 Scream — 18 2007 At Your Service — — 2009 Goodbye to Romance — 18 2011 Human Harbour ;Compilation albums Year Album Chart position NOR SWE 2002 Let's Celebrate 2002-2012 24 ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Swedish pop music groups Category:2000 establishments in Sweden
title: Melody Club
